mapper.select: SELECT w.company_id,w.* ,if(enddate>NOW(),'모집중','마감') state, c.company_name, c.photo, l.user_id FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON w.company_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN likes l ON l.wanted_id= w.id WHERE l.user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes(user_id, wanted_id, created) VALUES(#{userId}, #{wantedId}, NOW())
